codeList:
git clone https://github.com/milvus-io/birdwatcher.git
cd birdwatcher
go install github.com/milvus-io/birdwatcher
go run main.go
git clone https://github.com/milvus-io/birdwatcher.git
cd birdwatcher
go build -o birdwatcher main.go
./birdwatcher
wget -O birdwatcher.tar.gz \
https://github.com/milvus-io/birdwatcher/releases/download/latest/birdwatcher_<os>_<arch>.tar.gz
tar -xvzf birdwatcher.tar.gz
./birdwatcher
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: birdwatcher
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: birdwatcher
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: birdwatcher
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: birdwatcher
        image: milvusdb/birdwatcher
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: "128Mi"
            cpu: "500m"
git clone https://github.com/milvus-io/birdwatcher.git
cd birdwatcher
docker build -t milvusdb/birdwatcher .
...
      - name: birdwatcher
        image: milvusdb/birdwatcher
        imagePullPolicy: Never
...
kubectl apply -f deployment.yml
